title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: May 25, 2023, 04:07:16 AMLast edit: July 25, 2023, 08:46:43 PM by OneNutS
content: SecretPEP.com (SecretPEP) is an all-in-one decentralized platform that guarantees its users agility, convenience, privacy, and much more. The incorporated stealth wallet and stealth chat is a landmark achievement of the SecretPEP community.  More details on the website:  https://secretpep.com/ Â  â— Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: May 25 - June 8  lasts for 2 weeks.â— Tokens will be distributed to participants First release of 50% reward on 23rd June next release on 20th July 2023 â— Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every 3 days !â— Tokens will be distributed to participants within First release of 50% reward on 23rd June next release on 20th July 2023 in the Â BSC bep20 walletâ— Join SecretPEP on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Instagram- Discordâ— You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.â— Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.â— Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.â— Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. â— Make reports in a separate post every 3 days. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORTğŸ™!â— Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: Secret PEP Bounty,  Secret PEP Chat , Aladdin Center Telegram, Aladdin Center Twitterâ— Â Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- BSC ( bep 20 ) wallet address:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Bounty campaign reward pool: $25k worth SecretPEP will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Â Rewards dislocation:â— Video: Â 20%â— Article: Â 10%â— Twitter : 20%â— Telegram: 20%â— Instagram: 10%â— Discord: 10%â— Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  â— Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)â— High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )â— Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)â— Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules: Â â— Join SecretPEP on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Instagram- Discordâ— Each participant can send: Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â - YouTube - 2 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â - Tiktok - 2 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )â— Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.â— The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company Secret PEPâ— You must have at least (minimum) 100 views under your video to get the stakesâ— Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!â— Content topics:Â Â - Â Information can be used from social networks: https://secretpep.com/ Â https://secretpep.medium.com Â and use hashtags: #SecretPEP â— Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.â— Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.â— High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.â— Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â— All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.â— Please provide enough details of the bounty hunter at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!â— By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.â— Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join: Â 1. Â Join SecretPEP on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Instagram- Discord3. Write a good video about SecretPEP  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— Excellent: 4 stakesâ— High: 3 stakesâ— Good: 2 stakesâ— Average: 1 stakeRules:â— Each participant can write 2 original Â article only ( No more than 1 per week )â— Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.â— Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.â— Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.â— Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.â— In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company https://secretpep.com/ Â â— Content topics:Information can be used from social networks https://secretpep.com/ https://secretpep.medium.com and use hashtags: #SecretPEP â— Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â— Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.â— Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!â— By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materialsâ— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Â  Join SecretPEP on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Medium- Instagram- Discord2. Write a good article about https://secretpep.com/ Â project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week â— Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week â— Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekâ— Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekâ— Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:â— Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.â— Follow and like the official Twitter accountâ— Make 1 post every day. Use hashtag #SecretPEP Use information from official social networks. â— Make 1 repost every day. Use hashtag #SecretPEP Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. â— DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! â— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deletedâ— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin Centerâ— Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format:Â Code:â— Twitter Report â—- Day: XX - XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #2....- Tweet Link#2....- Retweet Link #3....- Tweet Link#3....Rewards:â— 1 comment = 1 stakes (10 stakes/week)â— 20 stakes once for wearing a â€œYour Name | Secret PEPâ€ + LOGO.Rules:â— Join Â - Telegramâ— Write at least 2 constructive messages per day in top exchangeâ€™s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups wonâ€™t be counted.â— DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !â— Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the Secret PEPâ— Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the personâ€™s thought. â— It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, donâ€™t write Â silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted. â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin Centerâ— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | Â Secret PEP Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports Â every 3 days Â using this format::Code: â— Telegram Report â—- Day XX - XX- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:.- Comment Link #6:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:â— Â 300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one postâ— Â 1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one postâ— Â 5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one postâ— Â 10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:â— Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.â— Follow and like the official Instagram account â— Â Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram Â  per Day.â— Like all posts on the official page.â— Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.â— Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports Â every 3 days using this format Â (work should be done each day):Code: â— Instagram Report â—- Day:XX-XX- Instagram Profile link:- Custom Post Link #1:- Custom Post Link #2:- Custom Post Link #3:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign. Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â Rewards:â— 10 stakes/week Â (maximum of 10 posts/comment per week)â— You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per dayRules:â— Â Must follow project Discord accountâ— Write at least 10 constructive messages in this list: https://disboard.org/servers/tag/crypto Â Posts/messages must be constructive and in a way that will not be considered spamming.â— DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !â— DO NOT use hashtags !!! For using hashtags - 0 stakes!â— You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per dayâ— Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the personâ€™s thought.â— It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, donâ€™t write silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.â— Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  SecretPEP Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make weekly report in this thread using this format:Code:â— Discord Report â—- Week:- Discord Profile link:- Discord comments:1: Link to Screenshot of Comment 2: Link to Screenshot of Comment 3: Link to Screenshot of Comment...etc.* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.
